info.title: API 1.0
info.description:
**Deprecated**, experimental Vend API. 
Payloads in this API are identical as payloads delivered in webhooks.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single consignment with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single consignment by ID

parameters.name: consignment_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing consignment.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single consignment product with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single consignment product by ID

parameters.name: consignment_product_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing consignment product.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single customer with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single customer by ID

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing customer.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single product with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single product by ID

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing product.

application/json.name: Coffee (Demo)
application/json.description: A cup of Coffee. You can delete this once you have some other products setup.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single product type with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single product type by ID

parameters.name: product_type_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing product type.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single sale with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single sale by ID

parameters.name: register_sale_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing sale.

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single supplier with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single supplier by ID

parameters.name: supplier_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing supplier.

application/json.name: Bob's burgers
application/json.description: The best supplier of super burgers

get.description:
**DEPRECATED** This endpoint has a 2.0 equivalent. We recommend using that instead.
Returns a single user with the given ID.
get.summary: Get a single user by ID

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: A valid ID of an existing user.

consignment_date.description: The date when the consignment was created.

due_at.description: The date when the consignment is due to be delivered.

received_at.description: The date when the consignment was delivered.

retailer_id.description: The ID of the retailer associated with this consignment.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet to which the goods are coming.

supplier_id.description: The ID of the supplier associated with this consignment.

source_outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet from which the goods are coming. Only used for stock transfers.

status.description: Status of the consignment. One of: `OPEN`, `SENT`, `RECEIVED`, `CANCELLED`,  `STOCKTAKE`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

type.description: The type of the consignment. One of:  `SUPPLIER`, `OUTLET`, `STOCKTAKE`.

accounts_transaction_id.description: The ID of a transaction in an external system associated with this consignment.

consignment_id.description: The ID of the consignment associated with this item.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this item.

count.description: Quantity "ordered" for stock orders or "expected" for stock takes.

received.description: Quantity "received" for stock orders or "counted" for stock takes.

cost.description: Supply cost of the item for this consignment.

sequence_number.description: Sequence order number for the item.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: An object containing this  customer's or supplier's contact details.

website.description: The URL of the contact's website.

retailer_id.description: The ID of the retailer associated with this customer.

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group this customer belongs to.

enable_loyalty.description: Indicates whether customer's purchases should incur loyalty.

custom_field_1.description: Custom field 1, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_2.description: Custom field 2, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_3.description: Custom field 3, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_4.description: Custom field 4, able to store any data as a string.

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group this customer belongs to.

enable_loyalty.description: Indicates whether customer's purchases should incur loyalty.

custom_field_1.description: Custom field 1, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_2.description: Custom field 2, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_3.description: Custom field 3, able to store any data as a string.

custom_field_4.description: Custom field 4, able to store any data as a string.

EmbeddedProductType.title: Embedded Product Type
EmbeddedProductType.description: The product type associated with the product.

name.description: The name of the product type.

outlet_id.description: The ID of an outlet associated with this inventory record.

attributed_cost.description: Current attributed cost for the product.

count.description: Current stock quantity of the product at the given outlet.

reorder_point.description: Quantity below which the product should be included in the auto-filled stock orders.

restock_level.description: The default of the quantity for auto-filled stock orders

product_id.description: ID of the product associated with this record.

max_units.description: Maximum product quantity for which this price book entry will be used.

min_units.description: Minimum product quantity for which this price book entry will be used.

price.description: Tax exclusive price of the product.

valid_from.description: The date/time from which this price is valid.

valid_to.description: The date/time to which this price is valid.

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group associated with this record.

customer_group_name.description: The name of the customer group associated with this record.

tax_id.description: The ID of the tax associated with this record.

retailer_id.description: The ID of the retailer associated with this product.

variant_parent_id.description: The ID of a parent product, if the product is a variant child.

source_id.description: The ID that can be used to reference a product in another system.

source_variant_id.description: The ID that can be used to reference a product variant in another system.

active.description: Indicates whether the product is currently active.

base_name.description: The root of the product's name as defined by the user in the UI. Doesn't include any variant related suffixes.

description.description: The description of the product. May include HTML.

attributed_cost.description: The current attributed cost of the product.

supply_price.description: The default cost of supply for the product.

button_order.description: A number describing the position of a variant in the UI.

price_book_entries.description: A list of price book entries associated with the product.

inventory.description: A list of inventory records associated with the product.

taxes.description: A list of outlet taxes associated with the product.

categories.description: A list of categories (tags) associated with the product.

ProductBrand.title: Product Brand
ProductBrand.description: The brand associated with the product.

name.description: The name of the Brand associated with the product.

ProductSupplier.title: Product Supplier
ProductSupplier.description: The supplier associated with the product.

ProductType.title: Product Type
ProductType.description: The product type associated with the product.

retailer_id.description: The ID of the retailer associated with this product type.

name.description: The name of the product type.

source_id.description: The ID of the sale on the client side or another system where the sale was originally created.

sale_date.description: The date of the sale. If not provided will be added as the time the sale reached the server.

status.description: Status of the sale. One of: `SAVED`, `CLOSED`, `ONACCOUNT`, `LAYBY`, `ONACCOUNT_CLOSED`, `LAYBY_CLOSED`, `VOIDED`.

user_id.description: The ID of the user (cashier) who created the sale.

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer associated with this sale.

register_id.description: The ID of the register where the sale was created.

invoice_number.description: The invoice number for the sale.

short_code.description: Short, unique code to be printed on the receipt for loyalty tracking purposes.

note.description: A note on the sale entered by the cashier.

register_sale_products.description: An array of products associated with the sale.

register_sale_payments.description: An array of payments associated with the sale.

taxes.description: A summary of taxes for the sale.

RegisterSaleGlobalPaymentType.title: Register Sale Global Payment Type
RegisterSaleGlobalPaymentType.description: **internal** An object containing additional details of the global payment type.

name.description: The name of the global payment type.

payment_date.description: The date and time of the payment.

retailer_payment_type_id.description: The ID of the retailer payment type associated with this payment.

payment_type_id.description: **internal** The ID of the global payment type associated with this payment.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this line item.

quantity.description: Quantity of products for the line item.

price.description: Unit price of the line item.

discount.description: Unit discount value for the line item.

loyalty_value.description: The value of loyalty that will be incurred by the customer for this line item.

price_set.description: Indicated whether the price was "fixed". If set to `"1"` it prevents recalculation of the total price based on the price from the database. One of `"0"` or `"1"`.

tax.description: The unit tax value associated with this line item.

price_total.description: Total price for this line item. (`price * quantity`).

tax_total.description: Total tax for this line item. (`tax * quantity`).

tax_id.description: The ID of the tax associated with this line item.

name.description: The name of the attribute. Currently one of: `item_note`, `is_return`.

RegisterSaleRetailerPaymentType.title: Register Sale Retailer Payment Type
RegisterSaleRetailerPaymentType.description: An object containing additional details of the retailer payment type.

name.description: The name of the payment type as defined by the user.

payment_type_id.description: **internal** The ID of the global payment type.

RegisterSaleRetailerPaymentTypeConfig.title: Register Sale Retailer Payment Type Config

url.description: The URL of an external gateway

tax.description: The total tax value for this tax.

RegisterSaleTotals.title: Register Sale Totals
RegisterSaleTotals.description: An object containing sale totals summary.

total_loyalty.description: Total loyalty value for the sale.

total_tax.description: Total tax value for this sale.

total_payment.description: Total payment value for the sale.

RegisterSaleUser.title: Register Sale User
RegisterSaleUser.description: The user associated with the sale.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet this user is assigned to.

retailer_id.description: The ID of the retailer associated with this supplier.
The ID of the retailer associated with this user.

outlet_id.description: **DEPRECATED** The ID of the outlet this user is assigned to.

url.description: The URL of the user's avatar.

name.description: The name of the variant option, e.g. `Size`.

value.description: The value of the variant option, e.g. `medium`.
